title: Bug 120922: "Dirty Page" behavior in XML Report Designer editor needs improvement
description:
The current behavior in the XML Report Designer editor is causing inconvenience to users. When editing the XML in the "source" view of the Layout Editor and trying to switch back to the Layout view, an error message is displayed indicating that the changes need to be saved. The error message is not clear and there is no guidance on how to save or discard the changes. Additionally, the dialog for this error message is incorrectly titled as "Error". The user is left unsure about how to proceed.

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Open the XML Report Designer editor.
2. Switch to the "source" view of the Layout Editor.
3. Make some changes to the XML.
4. Try to switch back to the Layout view.

Observed Behavior:
An error message is displayed indicating that the changes need to be saved, but it is not clear how to save or discard the changes. The dialog for this error message is incorrectly titled as "Error".

Expected Behavior:
When trying to switch back to the Layout view after making changes in the "source" view, a clear message should be displayed indicating that the changes need to be saved or discarded. The dialog should be correctly titled as "Dirty Page".
